descr.p: "It's Love, Love, Love" is a popular song.
The music was written by Joan Whitney and Alex Kramer, with lyrics by Mack David, and published in 1943.

The best-known recording was by Guy Lombardo and his Royal Canadians. It was recorded on January 7, 1944, and released by Decca Records as catalog number 18589. It first reached the Billboard magazine Best Seller chart on April 6, 1944 and lasted 10 weeks on the chart, peaking at #1.
